backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user registration, authentication, profiles, access control, and job applicant data with in‑memory maps and basic security checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping onboarding stability and retry improvements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, pages, and hooks across auth, onboarding, job seeker, and recruiter flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global base styles for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx and defining the mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration wiring all pages with AuthProvider, BackendActorProvider, and onboarding/auth route guards.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing the site title and a logout button that clears auth and query state.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, optional nav, content area, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Role‑aware navigation bar linking to job seeker or recruiter sections based on onboarding profile state.
frontend/src/features/actor/actorInitRet: Implements a retry policy with exponential backoff for actor initialization.
frontend/src/features/actor/BackendActor: Provides context for initializing and managing the backend actor with retry logic and query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthContext.t: Manages authentication state with login/logout and sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login form that authenticates users and handles backend actor initialization states.
frontend/src/features/auth/RequireAuth.t: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/features/auth/SignupPage.ts: Signup form that registers new users through the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/jobSeeker/JobSeeke: Allows job seekers to upload a photo and submit a job application with progress tracking.
Job seeker profile page allowing editing of personal details, location, and photo, with save and validation logic using actor API.
frontend/src/features/jobSeeker/useMyApp: Hook fetching the current user's job application via react-query, returning application data, loading state, and refetch.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Locatio: Onboarding page collecting user location and saving it through the actor before navigating based on role.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Require: Wrapper enforcing onboarding steps with redirects and showing loading or error states based on profile and actor readiness.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/RoleSel: Onboarding page for choosing user role, saving it via actor, and navigating to the next onboarding step.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useOnbo: Hook fetching the user's onboarding profile with retry logic and exposing loading, fetched, and error states.
frontend/src/features/recruiter/Recruite: Recruiter page listing applicants in the user's location, showing their details or an empty state.
frontend/src/features/recruiter/useAppli: Hook fetching applicants filtered by the recruiter's location using actor API and react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks and currently imports core query utilities and useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode values, and base utility styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React, configuring React Query, and wrapping the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Displays the branded welcome screen with a button that navigates users to the login page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URL parsing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, fonts, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting current feature implementations, requirements, issues, and architectural notes.
